Blog

What’s this for?

May 1, 2024

I have been meaning to put together a blog-like medium for a little while now, but could never settle on what I wanted to discuss. Here, I intend to talk about whatever, including some science, personal stuff, food, and more. This blog is different from some of the resources I have scraped together, and more informal. So…stay tuned!
